w1.name: Celestial Blessing
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kayle''' and the target allied champion are {{tip|heal|healed}} and gain {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} for 2 seconds.

If cast without a valid target, or [[self-targeted|self-cast]], ''Celestial Blessing'' will automatically target the closest allied champion in range, prioritizing the one with the least amount of {{sti|{{as|health}}}}.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Kayle and the target allied champion are healed and gain bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.
If cast without a valid target, or self-targeted, Celestial Blessing will automatically target the closest allied champion in range, prioritizing the one with the least amount of health.
leveling:
{{st|Heal|{{ap|60 to 180}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}}}
{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|24 to 40}}% {{as|(+ 8% per 100 AP)}}}}
w1.notes:
'''Details'''
* ''Celestial Blessing's'' cast time does not interrupt movement and the effects are applied at the start.
'''Interactions & Other'''
* If cast with [[Auto-targeted|auto-targeting]], ''Celestial Blessing'' may target allies who are {{tip|untargetable|untargetable}}, or allied clones that cannot be targeted by allies (such as {{cai|Warrior Trickster|Wukong}}).

effects.str:
• Heal: (+ 30% AP)

  • Bonus Movement Speed: % (+ 8% per 100 AP)

q1.name: Radiant Blast
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kayle''' conjures a portal in front of her that faces the target direction. After a {{fd|0.25}} second cast delay, a celestial sword launches forward from it.

The sword explodes in a cross-like shape upon colliding with an enemy. Targets struck are dealt {{as|magic damage}}, {{tip|slow|slowed}} for 2 seconds, and have their {{sti|lethality|{{as|armor}}}} and {{sti|magic penetration|{{as|magic resistance}}}} reduced by 15% for 4 seconds.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Kayle conjures a portal in front of her that faces the target direction. After a 0.25 second cast delay, a celestial sword launches forward from it.
The sword explodes in a cross-like shape upon colliding with an enemy. Targets struck are dealt magic damage, slowed for 2 seconds, and have their armor and magic resistance reduced by 15% for 4 seconds.
q1.notes: '''Details''' * The portal is created at the start of the cast time and it does not follow '''Kayle's''' movement, using {{si|Flash}} or getting displaced won't change its position nor direction. * The explosion consist of 5 hitboxes, forming a cross-like shape centered 100 units ahead from the impact in its direction. Their technical data can be seen below and visualized on the image to the right. [[File:Celestine Wish Kayle_Q_Explosion.png|thumb|The left side shows projectile's width and the total area traveled if it does not hit a target, while the right side shows the explosions when it hits a target.]] ** ExplosionCenter: 100 radius ** ExplosionLeft: 150 distance, 125 width ** ExplosionRight: 150 distance, 125 width ** ExplosionBackward: 100 distance, 90 width ** ExplosionForward: 400 distance, 90 width * The resistance reduction is applied after the damage has been dealt. '''Interactions & Other''' * The visual effects of the explosion shows the blade and guard of '''Kayle's''' swords. * The cast delay represents how much time needed for the projectile to spawn. ** Since patch [[V9.17]], the cast time matches the cast delay. The ability before had a 0.5 second cast delay and the cast time matched '''Kayle's''' basic attack timer. * The resistance reduction can be tracked on the HUD as a debuff called [[File:Radiant Blast 2.png|20px|link=]] '''Sundered'''. ** Its VFX only lasts for 3 seconds.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 60% bonus AD) (+ 50% AP)

  • Slow: %

e1.name: Starfire Spellblade
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Kayle''' deals {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} {{tip|on-hit}}. The fire waves' from {{ai|Divine Ascent|Kayle}} have equal base damage to this effect's base damage.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Kayle''' kindles her blade, empowering her next [[basic attack]] within 6 seconds to have an {{tip|uncancelable windup}} and deal additional {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} {{tip|on-hit}} that is capped at 400 against {{tip|monsters}}. Before ascending to {{ai|Divine Ascent|Kayle|Arisen}}, ''Starfire Spellblade'' also grants her {{sti|range|525 range}}.

After ascending to {{ai|Divine Ascent|Kayle|Aflame}}, ''Starfire Spellblade'' is upgraded, causing the basic attack to explode centered on the target, dealing {{as|100% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies within and applying {{tip|on-hit}} effects to them. The damage is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers.
''Starfire Spellblade'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Kayle's''' basic attack timer.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Kayle deals bonus magic damage on-hit. The fire waves' from Divine Ascent have equal base damage to this effect's base damage.
Active: Kayle kindles her blade, empowering her next basic attack within 6 seconds to have an uncancelable windup and deal additional bonus magic damage on-hit that is capped at 400 against monsters. Before ascending to Arisen, Starfire Spellblade also grants her 525 range.
After ascending to Aflame, Starfire Spellblade is upgraded, causing the basic attack to explode centered on the target, dealing 100% AD physical damage to all enemies within and applying on-hit effects to them. The damage is affected by critical strike modifiers.
Starfire Spellblade resets Kayle's basic attack timer.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|8 to 12}}% {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''missing''' health}}}}
e1.notes:
'''Details'''
* ''Starfire Spellblade'' consist of 3 parts, each dealing different type of damage source type:
** The basic attack part deals {{tip|basic damage|basic}}.
** The passive's on-hit effect deals {{tip|proc damage|proc}}.
** The active's portion deals {{tip|spell damage|spell}}.
** Additionally, the damage against secondary targets caught in the explosion is also tagged as [[area of effect]]. 
* The basic attack and the active's portion shares the same {{tip|cast instance}} since patch [[V11.1]]. (Exception: {{ii|Muramana}}, see under '''Interactions'''.)
* Parry interactions:
** {{tip|Blind}}: The main target will never receive damage, but the secondary targets will receive the active's spell damage.
** {{tip|Block}}: Blocking will always negate all damage. Keep in mind that if a secondary target is outside of {{ais|Spirit's Refuge|Shen}} zone, they won't block damage.
** {{tip|Dodge}}: Dodging will always negate all damage.
* {{pending for test}}: All parry interactions are marked for retesting because of patch [[V11.1]] changes.
* The basic attack portion of the active's explosion is a standard basic attack, just in an area of effect. It is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers and other effects that interact with basic attacks, such as {{ii|Plated Steelcaps}}.
** Keep in mind that {{tip|on-attack}} effects are only applied once per basic attack, not per target hit.
'''Interactions & Other'''
* ''Starfire Spellblade'' can behave both as a {{tip|ranged}} and {{tip|melee}} attack based on how far the target is prior to '''Kayle''' ascending to {{ai|Divine Ascent|Kayle|Arisen}}, after which the attack will be always using ranged standards.
** If the target is 200 units away or closer, the attack will be considered melee.
** If the target is over 200 units, the attack will be considered ranged. To further expand on this: Using the ranged empowered attack will change '''Kayle's''' range type to ranged while the projectile is alive. This means that if the target could outrun the projectile, '''Kayle''' will be stuck on being ranged, although the bonuses are not kept.
* While the effect is active a circle is visible to '''Kayle''', indicating her {{sti|range}}, however, this circle only takes into account {{ais|Divine Ascent|Kayle}} effect on her range, not other sources such as {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}}.
** The increased range will be {{sti|range|675}} prior to ascending to {{sbc|Transcendent}}, after which it's {{sti|range|725}}.
* Single-use on-hits, such as {{tip|Spellblade}}, will be applied to the main target.
** If the main target died prior to the projectile reaching them, or if it was a [[Jungle plants|jungle plant]], the effects will be applied to the closest target from the explosion's center.
* {{iis|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} {{nie|Phantom Hit}} can only be applied to the main target.
* Despite being one cast instance, ''Starfire Spellblade'' triggers {{iis|Muramana}} {{nie|Shock}} twice, dealing normal bonus damage after the basic attack and increased bonus damage after the spell, totalling at {{as|{{as|{{rd|{{fd|5}}%|{{fd|4.2}}%}} '''maximum''' mana}} {{as|(+ 6% AD)}} '''bonus''' physical damage|physical damage}}.
e1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|8 to 6}}|Starts post-effect}}' as '0/7.333/6.667/6/5.333/0' and riot's value '8,7.5,7,6.5,6' as '8/7.5/7/6.5/6'

effects.str: • Passive Damage: (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 20% AP)
• Bonus Magic Damage: % (+ 2% per 100 AP) of target's missing health

st_slices: % (+ 2% per 100 AP) of target's '''missing''' health

r1.name: Divine Judgment
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kayle''' grants herself or the target allied champion {{tip|invulnerable|invulnerability}} for a few seconds once the cast time begins, conjuring swords of holy fire, and highlighting a fixed area around the target.
Upon completing the cast time, the swords rain down, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies in the highlighted area.
''Divine Judgment'' will prioritize casting on allies over '''Kayle'''.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Kayle grants herself or the target allied champion invulnerability for a few seconds once the cast time begins, conjuring swords of holy fire, and highlighting a fixed area around the target.
Upon completing the cast time, the swords rain down, dealing magic damage to enemies in the highlighted area.
Divine Judgment will prioritize casting on allies over Kayle.
r1.notes:
'''Details'''
* ''Divine Judgment's'' cast time does not interrupt movement.
** The cast time will finish even after '''Kayle's''' death.
** Because {{tip|raw damage|internalraw}} damage ignores invulnerability, the target may still die via {{tip|Nexus Obelisk}}, but the ability will finish at their corpse's position regardless.
* Prior to becoming {{sbc|Transcended}}, casting ''Divine Judgment'' refreshes the duration of {{ai|Zealous|Kayle}} stacks.
* '''Kayle's''' basic {{stil|attack range|link=range}} is reduced to 400 during ''Divine Judgment's'' cast time to bring her within the effective range of the ability if attack commands are issued on an enemy.
* The area around the target does not appear if the target is not {{tip|sight|visible}} to the enemies' point of view.
* While the target is {{tip|invulnerable}}, a number indicator will appear beneath them whenever they would receive damage to show the amount that was entirely mitigated. This is calculated pre-mitigation, or before resistances and reductions are taken into account.
'''Interactions & Other'''
* {{iis|Rapid Firecannon}} {{nie|Energized}} behaves strangely with the set basic attack range, causing it to go from {{sti|range|400}} to {{sti|range|385}} over 4 {{tt|stat updates|A stat update occurs every 0.25 seconds.}}. (So 400 - 390 - 387 - 385)
** Upon completing the cast time, the proper range needs 2 updates to set in. ({{sti|range|660}} - {{sti|range|675}} while {{ai|Divine Ascent|Kayle|Arisen}}; {{sti|range|710}} - {{sti|range|725}} while {{ai|Divine Ascent|Kayle|Ascended}})
** Gaining ''Energized'' during the cast time will cause the range to cycle between {{sti|range|525}} and {{sti|range|550}} until the cast time finishes and set to the proper range after 1 update.
** Selling {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}} during the cast time sets the range to be {{sti|range|250}}
* The {{tip|invulnerable|invulnerability}} can be tracked on the HUD as a buff called [[File:Divine Judgment.png|20px|link=]] '''Intervention'''.

effects.str: • Magic Damage: (+ 100% bonus AD) (+ 80% AP)

i1.name: Divine Ascent
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Upon reaching [[Experience (champion)|levels]] 1, 6, 11, and 16, along with spending a skill point, '''Kayle''' ascends into a new form, gaining additional bonuses.

{{sbc|Level 1 - Zealous:}} '''Kayle''' {{tip|on-attack}} gains {{sti|attack speed|{{as|6%|attack speed}} {{as|(+ 1% per 100 AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times for a maximum of {{sti|attack speed|{{as|30%|attack speed}}}} {{as|(+ 5% per 100 AP)}}. At maximum stacks, '''Kayle''' becomes ''Exalted'' and gains {{sti|ms|{{as|8% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}}.
{{sbc|Level 6 - Arisen:}}  '''Kayle''' becomes {{tip|ranged}} and gains {{sti|range|350 '''bonus''' attack range}}, for a total of {{sti|range|525}}.

{{sbc|Level 11 - Aflame:}} While ''Exalted'', '''Kayle''' {{tip|on-attack}} additionally launches a wave of fire forward, dealing {{as|{{pp|type=[[File:Starfire Spellblade.png|20px|link=]] Starfire Spellblade's Rank|15;15 to 35 for 5|0 to 5}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 10% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to enemies it passes through. The wave is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers.
{{sbc|Level 16 - Transcendent:}} '''Kayle''' is permanently ''Exalted'' and gains an additional {{sti|range|100 '''bonus''' attack range}}, for a total of {{sti|range|625}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Upon reaching Experience (champion) 1, 6, 11, and 16, along with spending a skill point, Kayle ascends into a new form, gaining additional bonuses.
Level 1 - Zealous: Kayle on-attack gains 6% (+ 1% per 100 AP) bonus attack speed for 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times for a maximum of 30% (+ 5% per 100 AP). At maximum stacks, Kayle becomes Exalted and gains 8% bonus movement speed.
Level 6 - Arisen: Kayle becomes ranged and gains 350 bonus attack range, for a total of 525.
Level 11 - Aflame: While Exalted, Kayle on-attack additionally launches a wave of fire forward, dealing 0 to 5 â€’ undefined (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 25% AP) magic damage to enemies it passes through. The wave is affected by critical strike modifiers.
Level 16 - Transcendent: Kayle is permanently Exalted and gains an additional 100 bonus attack range, for a total of 625.
i1.notes:
'''Zealous'''
* The stacking {{as|attack speed}} is tracked via a buff called [[File:Zealous.png|20px|link=]] '''Zeal''', while the maximum stacks bonus grants the buff [[File:Divine Ascent.png|20px|link=]] '''Exalted'''.
* All sources of {{as|ability power}} will increase the amount of {{as|attack speed}} gained by [[File:Zealous.png|20px|link=]] '''Zeal''' stacks until ascending to {{sbc|Transcendent}}.
** Each stack grants {{as|attack speed}} based on the amount of {{as|ability power}} '''Kayle''' has at the time the stack is acquired. For example, if a stack is acquired while '''Kayle''' has {{sti|{{as|100 ability power}}}}, it will grant {{sti|{{as|7% attack speed}}}}. If an additional {{sti|{{as|100 ability power}}}} is gained immediately afterwards (for a total of {{sti|{{as|200|ability power}}}}), the next stack will grant {{sti|attack speed|{{as|8%|attack speed}}}}. If all {{as|ability power}} is then immediately lost, the next stack will only grant {{sti|attack speed|{{as|6%|attack speed}}}}.
* If '''Kayle''' is in her attack animation after the stacks expire, she gains another {{fd|0.5}} seconds to refresh/stack [[File:Zealous.png|20px|link=]] '''Zeal'''.
'''Arisen'''
* Basic attacks within {{sti|range|175}} will still use '''Kayle's''' melee basic attack animations and do not utilize {{tip|projectile|projectiles}}.
** They are still classified as {{tip|ranged}} attacks.
** Due to this fact, projectile blocking effects cannot intercept basic attacks while '''Kayle's''' target is within her "melee" range.
'''Aflame'''
* Basic attacks against [[structures]] do not trigger fire waves.
* While at 4 stacks of [[File:Zealous.png|20px|link=]] '''Zeal''', the next {{tip|on-attack}} reaching the fifth stack will be empowered by {{sbc|Aflame}}, releasing the first fire wave.
'''Transcendent'''
* [[File:Zealous.png|20px|link=]] '''Zeal''' and [[File:Divine Ascent.png|20px|link=]] '''Exalted''' buffs swapped to a new buff that grants the benefit of both and it is not visible on Kayle's HUD.
** The {{as|attack speed}} no longer needs to be stacked up and will be always on maximum value.
** This buff also updates its {{as|attack speed}} value whenever a stat update happens and {{as|ability power}} is changed. However, it does not track {{as|ability power}} from other buffs, unless they have been specifically special cased, unlike with [[File:Zealous.png|20px|link=]] '''Zeal'''. The following buffs are not special cased yet:
*** [[Rune]]s (excluding [[File:Rune shard Adaptive Force.png|20px|link=Runes Reforged#Shards]] [[Runes Reforged#Shards|Adaptive Force rune shards]] )
*** {{bi|Infernal Might}}
*** {{cai|W|Yuumi}}
*** {{ii|Staff of Flowing Water}}
'''Fire Waves Details'''
* [[File:Celestine Wish Kayle Fire Wave.png|thumb|Hitboxes shows by a graph side by side.]] A wave consists of three projectiles for the hitbox and a fourth for visuals.
* The hitbox projectiles spawn 75 units behind '''Kayle''', travel through her, and are destroyed once they've traveled 850 units. Their technical details are:
** {{sbc|Range:}} {{tip|cr|850}} (755 effective)
** {{sbc|Width:}} {{tip|er|200}}
** {{sbc|Projectile Speed:}} 2800
** {{sbc|Angle:}} 18{{degree}} (left and right at 9{{degree}} to their side, respectively)
* {{tip|Projectile}} blocking effects can block each projectile individually.
** It is possible to block the visuals, but still get hit by an unblocked "invisible" hitbox projectile.
* Hitting an enemy with multiple projectiles of the same wave will not increase the damage dealt.
* The fire wave shares {{tip|cast instance}} with the triggering basic attack.
** The amount of {{ri|Conqueror}} stacks gained will be {{rd|2|1}} if the basic attack deals damage first or 2 if the wave does so.
* Keep in mind that it's still two damage instances. If one triggers {{ri|Bone Plating}}, the other's damage will be blocked.
* Fire waves roll {{tip|critical strike|critical strike chance}} on each target hit individually.
* A known issue is that despite dealing {{tip|area damage|area spell damage}} the fire wave does not:
** consume {{nie|Mana Charge}} from {{ii|Tear of the Goddess}} and its upgrades,
** or trigger {{ri|Manaflow Band}}.
'''Interactions & Other'''
* Both the stacking and launching a fire wave is an {{tip|on-attack}} effect that is triggered whenever '''Kayle''' completes her {{tip|attack windup}}.
* Because '''Kayle''' is both a {{tip|melee}} and {{tip|ranged}} champion, she can purchase both ranged and melee exclusive items at anytime, but their effects will function depending on her current range type; the same principle also applies to [[runes]].
* Waves are fired in the direction that '''Kayle''' is facing. Changing that during the early animation via {{si|Flash}} will also change the direction of the wave.
* Each ascension has an unique animation and a voice line. ''([[Kayle/LoL/Audio|See: Kayle's quotes]])''
* The ascensions' animation will override the current one, but it does not cancel '''Kayle's''' current action, nor her previous orders.
